overview: Embark on a journey from Jamaica to Britain, through the Second World War to 1948 â€“ the year the HMT Empire Windrush docked at Tilbury, England.  The play follows three intricately connected stories. Hortense yearns for a new life away from rural Jamaica, Gilbert dreams of becoming a lawyer, and Queenie longs to escape her Lincolnshire roots.
title: National Theatre Live: Small Island
